loginUrl:
<js>
  function login() {
  	 const user = String(source.getLoginInfoMap().get("账号"))
    const pw = String(source.getLoginInfoMap().get("密码"))
    let sign = java.md5Encode(`isDevice=Android&password=${pw}&phone=${user}&regDevice=2&key=87ac02d392a8d3566fe7748c8de00af3&secrect=57dcuidu8aa8062bfe8042ea65310669`).toString().toUpperCase()
    let data = JSON.stringify({
      isDevice: "Android",
      password: pw,
      phone: user,
      regDevice: "2",
      sign: sign
    })
    let op = JSON.stringify({
      method: "POST",
      body: data
    })
    let res = java.ajax(`https://api.shaoniandream.com/Login/login,${op}`)
    let $ = JSON.parse(res)
    if($.status != 1) java.toast($.msg)
    java.put("uid",$.data.id)
    source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify({
      logintoken: $.data.logintoken
    }))
  	}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.tocUrl:
<js>
  let uid =  java.get("uid") != "undefined" ? java.get("uid") : "-1"
  let sign = java.md5Encode(`BookID={{$.id}}&UserID=${uid}&isDevice=Android&regDevice=2&key=87ac02d392a8d3566fe7748c8de00af3&secrect=57dcuidu8aa8062bfe8042ea65310669`).toString().toUpperCase()
  let data = JSON.stringify({
    BookID: {{$.id}},
    UserID: uid,
    isDevice: "Android",
    regDevice: "2",
    sign: sign
  })
  let op = JSON.stringify({
      method: "POST",
      body: data
    })
  "https://api.shaoniandream.com/Booklibrary/readdir," + op
</js>

ruleContent.content: let $ = JSON.parse(result) let content = $.data.show_content.map((item)=>{ return java.base64Decode(item.content) }).join("\n").trim() let img = $.data.chapterpic.map((item)=>{ return `` }).join("\n").trim() let miaoshu = java.base64Decode($.data.miaoshu) let txt = "" if(miaoshu != "") txt = `${content}\n${img}\n作者有话说：\n${miaoshu}` else txt = `${content}\n${img}` txt

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  let $ = JSON.parse(result)
  let uid = java.get("uid") != "undefined" ? java.get("uid") : "-1"
  let array = []
  $.data.chapterList.forEach((booklet) => {
    array.push({
    	 name: booklet.title,
    	 isv: true
    })
    booklet.chapterList.forEach((chapter) => {
    	 let sign = java.md5Encode(`BookID=${$.data.id}&UserID=${uid}&chapter_id=${chapter.id}&isDevice=Android&isMarket=true&regDevice=2&key=87ac02d392a8d3566fe7748c8de00af3&secrect=57dcuidu8aa8062bfe8042ea65310669`).toString().toUpperCase()
    	 let data = JSON.stringify({
    	   BookID: $.data.id,
    	   UserID: uid,
    	   chapter_id: chapter.id,
    	   isDevice: "Android",
    	   isMarket:"true",
    	   regDevice: "2",
    	   sign: sign
    	 })
      let op = JSON.stringify({
        method: "POST",
        body: data
      })
      array.push({
        name: chapter.title,

<js>
function login(){
userInfo=source.getLoginInfoMap()
java.log(userInfo)
UNE=userInfo['手机号码/邮箱号']
PWD=userInfo['密码']
url="{{source.getKey()}}/api/passport/login,";
SU=source.getKey()
body={
  "account": String(UNE),
  "password": String(PWD),
  "mp_token": -1
}
option={
'method': 'POST',
'body': JSON.stringify(body)
}

url=url+JSON.stringify(option)
token=java.ajax(url).match(/"auth_token":"([^"]+)"/)[1]

Cookie={
	"Cookie":"auth_token="+token
	}
header = JSON.stringify(Cookie)
source.putLoginHeader(header)
}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
            
var document = JsDom.parse(src);
            
// 获取包含<li>元素的<div>元素
var divs = document.select('ul.list > div');

// 将divs转换为数组以便排序
var divArray = [];
for (var i = 0; i < divs.size(); i++) {
    divArray.push(divs.get(i));
}

// 按照data-id属性对divArray进行排序
divArray.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.attr('data-id'), 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.attr('data-id'), 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});

var list = [];
// 遍历排序后的divArray
for (var i = 0; i < divArray.length; i++) {
    var div = divArray[i];
    var dataId = div.attr('data-id');
    // 获取当前div下的所有<li>元素
    var lis = div.select('li');
    for (var j = 0; j < lis.size(); j++) {
        var li = lis.get(j);
        var a = li.select('a').first();
        if (a != null) {
            list.push({
                text: a.text(),
                id: dataId, // 使用data-id属性
                url: a.attr('href')
            });
        }
    }
}

//java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

  //showjname设置章节名显示卷名true or false

  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.volumes.forEach((booklet) => {
  	  java.put('jname',booklet.name)
    array.push({ 
    	    name:'◆◇'+String(booklet.name)+'◇◆',
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.chapters.forEach((chapter) => {
href='http://api.ieasou.com/api/bookapp/chargeChapter.m?a=1&autoBuy=0&cid=eef_easou_book&version=002&os=android&udid=1c5b2618a57a0848e2510649dc1e03896f462284&appverion=1122&ch=blf1298_12337_001&session_id=-nEvkqSq_9ZyORN5OoVOOzJ&dzh=1&scp=0&appid=10001&utype=0&rtype=3&pushid=f97b7f81a269472c07708277b7c40b4f&ptype=5&gender=0&userInitPay=3&birt=1658424532472&instime=1658424529924&instId=1658424529924&chType=3&bidType=0&recSw=1&appType=0&gid='+java.get('gid')+'&nid='+chapter.nid+'&sort='+chapter.sort+'&gsort=0&sgsort=0&sequence=4&chapter_name='+chapter.chapter_name
      array.push({
        name: !java.get('jname')?chapter.chapter_name:((obj.showjname?'※'+java.get('jname')+'※ ':'').padStart(3,''))+chapter.chapter_name,
        url: href,
        time:"本章字数:"+String(chapter.wordCount)+"字",
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })
  array

result?result:'无法获取内容？
1.编辑书源添加自己的账号信息，找到目录列表规则，按提示添加账号信息
2.如果添加了账号信息仍然无法获取内容，请尝试刷新或更新账号信息（方式二）
3.必要说明：如果使用方式一添加了账号信息，每次打开新的书籍详情页或刷新正文都会重新获取账号信息，因此之前获取的书籍正文的链接将会失效，因此建议全文下载或者按2操作
必要说明：在使用本源前，请考虑到使用本源可能造成的账号封禁等问题'

loginUrl:
<js>
function browserLogin() {
  try {
    java.startBrowserAwait(
      "https://qidian.com", 
      "登录"
    )
  } catch (e) {}
  let ywkey = cookie.getKey("qidian.com", "ywkey")
  let ywguid = cookie.getKey("qidian.com", "ywguid")
  java.toast(ywkey)
  cookie.removeCookie("qidian.com")
  let uInfo = java.ajax("https://qqapp.qidian.com/ajax/bookShelf/list?pageNum=1&pageSize=20&_csrfToken=," + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 8.1.0; MI PAD 4 Build/OPM1.171019.019; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/90.0.4430.226 KsWebView/1.8.90.612 (rel) Safari/537.36 NetType/wifi Language/zh miniProgram/1.60.0 KUAISHOU/11.5.30.31599 aegon/3.32.2',
      Connection: 'Keep-Alive',
      platformType: 'android',
      Referer: 'https://miniapi.ksapisrv.com/',
      'content-type': 'application/json',
      Cookie: `ywguid=${ywguid}; ywkey=${ywkey}`
    }
  }))
  uInfo = JSON.parse(uInfo)
  putLoginHeader({
      guid: ywguid,
      key: ywkey,
      uid: uInfo.data.user.userId
  })
}

function login() {}

function tokenLogin() {
  if (source.getLoginInfoMap() == null) {
    java.toast("未获取到LoginInfoMap，请尝试重新打开登录UI再按一遍")
  }
  let ywguid = source.getLoginInfoMap()["ywguid"]
  let ywkey = source.getLoginInfoMap()["ywkey"]
  let uInfo = java.ajax("https://qqapp.qidian.com/ajax/bookShelf/list?pageNum=1&pageSize=20&_csrfToken=," + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 8.1.0; MI PAD 4 Build/OPM1.171019.019; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/90.0.4430.226 KsWebView/1.8.90.612 (rel) Safari/537.36 NetType/wifi Language/zh miniProgram/1.60.0 KUAISHOU/11.5.30.31599 aegon/3.32.2',
      Connection: 'Keep-Alive',
      platformType: 'android',
      Referer: 'https://miniapi.ksapisrv.com/',
      'content-type': 'application/json',
      Cookie: `ywguid=${ywguid}; ywkey=${ywkey}`
    }
  }))
  uInfo = JSON.parse(uInfo)
  putLoginHeader({
    guid: ywguid,
    key: ywkey,
    uid: uInfo.data.user.userId
  })
  cookie.removeCookie("qidian.com")
  java.toast("凭据保存成功")
}

function fixInformation() {
  let h = getLoginHeader()
  if (!Packages.android.text.TextUtils.isEmpty(h.uid)) {
    java.toast("您的登录信息是完整的，不需要补全")
    return
  }
  let ywkey = h.key
  let ywguid = h.guid
  let uInfo = java.ajax("https://qqapp.qidian.com/ajax/bookShelf/list?pageNum=1&pageSize=20&_csrfToken=," + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 8.1.0; MI PAD 4 Build/OPM1.171019.019; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/90.0.4430.226 KsWebView/1.8.90.612 (rel) Safari/537.36 NetType/wifi Language/zh miniProgram/1.60.0 KUAISHOU/11.5.30.31599 aegon/3.32.2',
      Connection: 'Keep-Alive',
      platformType: 'android',
      Referer: 'https://miniapi.ksapisrv.com/',
      'content-type': 'application/json',
      Cookie: `ywguid=${ywguid}; ywkey=${ywkey}`
    }
  }))
  uInfo = JSON.parse(uInfo)
  putLoginHeader({
    guid: ywguid,
    key: ywkey,
    uid: uInfo.data.user.userId
  })
  java.toast("成功")
  cookie.removeCookie("qidian.com")
}

function proxyExcWrapper(fun) {
  try {
    fun()
  } catch (e) {
    java.log(e.toString() + e.stack)
  }
}

function tutorial() {
  java.toast("如果你是群里原书源用户，请点一下获取信息")
}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var Regs = [/bookId=(\d+)/i, /\.com\D+?\/(\d+)/i, /(\d+)/i];
var bookId = "";
for (let Reg of Regs) {
    let mat = baseUrl.match(Reg);
    if (mat) {
        bookId = mat[1];
        break;
    }
}
java.ajax(QDSign("v2/bookdetail/get", [
    "bookId=" + bookId
]))
</js>
$.Data

ruleContent.content: let info = JSON.parse(java.hexDecodeToString(result)) let content = "" let header = getLoginHeader() switch (info.source) { case "qd": let bid = java.hexDecodeToString(java.ajax(book.tocUrl)) let cid = info.cid if (info.isVip) { let url = `https://ksapp.qidian.com/ajax/chapter/getInfo?debug=1&bookId=${bid}&chapterId=${cid}&_csrfToken,` + JSON.stringify({ headers: { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 8.1.0; MI PAD 4 Build/OPM1.171019.019; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/90.0.4430.226 KsWebView/1.8.90.612 (rel) Safari/537.36 NetType/wifi Language/zh miniProgram/1.60.0 KUAISHOU/11.5.30.31599 aegon/3.32.2', Connection: 'Keep-Alive', 'platformType': 'android', Referer: 'https://miniapi.ksapisrv.com/', 'content-type': 'application/json', Cookie: `ywguid=${header.guid}; ywkey=${header.key}` } }) let body = JSON.parse(java.log(java.ajax(url))).data let user = body.user body = body.chapterInfo content = body.content if (body.vipStatus && !body.limitFree && !body.isBuy) { content += ("\n=============\n试读结束，继续阅读请 [购买]\n本章价格: " + body.price + "点") } } else { let request = QDSign("v2/bookcontent/safegetcontent", [ "bookId=" + bid, "chapterId=" + cid ], "", true) let body = getBytes(request.url, request.headers) let decrypt = dContentQD(cid, body) let raw = JSON.parse(decrypt) let cArr = raw.Content.split("\r\n") let blocks = {} for (let i of raw.Blocks) { blocks[i.Sort] = i } for (let i = 0; i < cArr.length; i++) { content += cArr[i] + "\n" if (blocks[i + 1] && blocks[i + 1].Type == "image") content += `\n` } } } content

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')

.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

<js>
var lis="";
//获取所有dd标签，依次存入数组arr
var aDiv = java.getElements("@@.content@dd");
    var arr = [];
    for(var i=0;i<aDiv.length;i++){
    	        arr.push(aDiv[i]);
    }
//按data-id属性值升序排列arr中的元素
    arr.sort(function(a,b){return a.attr('data-id') - b.attr('data-id')});
//依次拼接排序后arr中的元素
    for(var i=0;i<arr.length;i++){
    	lis=lis+arr[i];
    }
    lis
    //java.log(lis)
</js>

<js>
var data=[]
list=java.getElements('.g')
c=java.getElements('.content')
for(i=0;i<list.length;i++){
	text=list[i].select('a').text()
	href=list[i].select('a').attr('href')
	author=list[i].select('font').text()
	desc=c[i].text()
	data.push(JSON.stringify({
		text,href,desc,author
	}))
}
data

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

.replace("••","")

.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

	}else{result=result}
	result;

	con_=con_.replace(CCC[1],CCC[0]);
		}
}
result=con_.replace(/\\\\n/g,"\<br\>");

<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请稍后访问~"}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

let lis=java.getElements('class.BCsectionTwo-top@tag.li')
let list=[]
num=parseInt(java.get("num"))
for(var i=0;i<lis.length;i++){
	
java.setContent(lis[i],"https://www.tenghuxs.com/")
	ss=java.getElement('tag.a')
	
	str='{"name": "第'+String(num)+'章 '+ss.text()+'","href":"'+ss.attr("href")+'"}'

	num=num+1
	}
	java.put("num",num)
list

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　🔸最近更新：' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
url:og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
<js>last=JSON.parse(java.ajax('http://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/chapterList?novelId='+baseUrl.match(/(\d+)/)[1])).chapterlist;
$=last[last.length-1];
vip=$.isvip?'🔒':'';
chapterid=$.chapterid;
chaptername=$.chaptername;
date=$.chapterdate;
vip+chapterid+'.'+chaptername+' • '+date
</js>
<js>result.replace(/\.\d+/,'').replace(/\d+\.第/,'第').replace(/\d+\.Chapter/,'Chapter')</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: $.novelName@put:{id:$.novelId,ns:$.novelStep,nw:'$.novelSize##\\D'}
ruleBookInfo.author: $.authorName

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
key=java.get('key');
page=java.get('page');

//创建两个空数组
json=[];json2=[];

//判定json里是否有items
if(JSON.parse(result).items){
json=JSON.parse(result).items;}

//加载作者搜索页面并转为json
json1=JSON.parse(java.ajax('http://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/search?keyword='+key+'&type=2&page='+page+'&searchType=7&sortMode=DESC'));

//判定json里是否有items
if(json1.items){
json2=json1.items
}

//书名搜索列表与作者搜索列表拼接
list=json.concat(json2);


result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>
$.[*]
ruleSearch.name: $.novelname@put:{id:$.novelid||$.novelId}
ruleSearch.author: $.authorname
ruleSearch.lastChapter:
<js>
last=JSON.parse(java.ajax('http://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/chapterList?novelId='+java.get('id'))).chapterlist;
if(last){
last=last[last.length-1];
vip=last.isvip!=0?"🔒":'';
date=last.chapterdate;
chapter=last.chaptername;
chapterid=last.chapterid;
result=vip+chapterid+'.'+chapter+' • '+date}
</js>
<js>result.replace(/\.\d+/,'').replace(/\d+\.第/,'第').replace(/\d+\.Chapter/,'Chapter')</js>

@js:
u="https://m.hjbook.com/search.php?keyword=submit="
loc=java.get(u,{})
lo=String(loc.headers("location"||"Location")).replace(/\[(.*)\]/,"$1")
code=loc.statusCode()
if(code>=301){
uu=source.key+lo
java.log(uu)
re=java.ajax(uu)
java.log(uu)
na=re.match(/" name="(.*)" v/)[1]
va=re.match(/value="(.*)"\/\>/)[1]
no=re.match(/bute\("value","(.*)"\),d/)[1]
bd=`${na}=${va}&nonce=${no}`
java.log(bd)
url=source.key+"/search.php?keyword={{key}}&submit=,"+JSON.stringify({
  "body": bd,
  "method": "POST",
    	})}else{url=source.key+"/search.php?keyword={{key}}&submit="}

now=String(baseUrl).replace(/.*start=(\d+).*/,"$1");
all=String(baseUrl).replace(/.*serialnum=(\d+).*/,"$1");
n=parseInt(all)/10+1;

if (n>now){
for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
 url[i]=url0+i+url1;
}

</js>

<js>
list=[]
lis=java.getElements('class.directoryArea@tag.p@tag.a')
for(var i=1;i<lis.length-1;i++){
	name=lis[i].text()
	surl=lis[i].attr('href')
	temp={
		"name":name,
		"surl":surl
		}
		list.push(temp)
	}
list
</js>

    var arr = [];
    for(var i=0;i<aDiv.length;i++){
    	        arr.push(aDiv[i]);
    }
//按data-id属性值升序排列arr中的元素
    arr.sort(function(a,b){return a.attr('data-id') - b.attr('data-id')});
//依次拼接排序后arr中的元素
    for(var i=0;i<arr.length;i++){
    	lis=lis+arr[i];
    }

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    var txt = java.getString("#novelcontent@html");
    java.longToast("正文解密失败，转为webView动态加载。");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    // 遍历数组，使用阅读内置Base64解码方法
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
//获取正文内容
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请换源或稍后访问~"}
</js>

list=JSON.parse(result).data.list;
Json=[]
for(i in list){

}
}
result=JSON.stringify(Json)

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
if(/_1.?$/.test(baseUrl)){
	lis=java.get("lis");
	li=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(lis);
	list=java.getElement(".chapter-list");
	result=li+list;
	}else if(!/_\d+/.test(baseUrl)){
		result="";
		}
		//java.log(baseUrl+result)
	result;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
let regex = /var c="([^"]*)"/;
let dd = result.match(regex)[1]

let j = java.base64Decode(dd);
  //java.log(j)
  jja=String(j).replace(/^[^-]*-/,"-")
  if(/=/.test(jja)){jj=jja.replace(/=[^=]*$/,"");}else{jj=jja.replace(/_[^_]*$/,"");}
  
m=jj.replace(/-/g,"PHA+").replace(/_/g,"8L3A+");
n=java.getString("@@.read-content@p!0@html");
n+	java.base64Decode(m)
</js>
ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##荔芳文学.*|本章未完.*|小说推荐.*》|更多内容加载中.*\n本站只支持手机浏览器访.*
##牺如.*牺如|汜减.*汜。|牺如.*牺如。|芈何.*芈。|汜减.*汜|芈何.*芈|.*请大家.*更新速度.*|.*继续阅读.*

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}##最新章节:
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
ruleBookInfo.name: [property$=book_name]@content
ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content

exploreUrl:
<js>
const res = java.connect(`${baseUrl}/sort/`);
var regex = /<li><a href="(\/sort\/\d+_\d+\/)">([^<]+)<\/a><span>共 (\d+) 本<\/span><\/li>/g;
const html = res.body();

const categories = [];
let match;
while ((match = regex.exec(html)) != null) {
  java.log(match[2])
  categories.push({
    url: match[1],
    title: match[2],
    count: parseInt(match[3], 10)
  });
}

JSON.stringify(categories);
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
list=[]
lis=java.getElements('class.lb fk@tag.li@tag.a')
for(i in lis){
	surl=lis[i].attr('href')
	if(surl!=''){
		temp={
			"name":lis[i].text(),
			"surl":surl
			}
			list.push(temp)
		}
		surl=''
	}
	//java.log(JSON.stringify(list))
	list
</js>
ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>

if(/_/.test(baseUrl)==0){
lis=java.getElements('class.fy@class.showpage r3.0@tag.a')
for(i in lis){
	if(lis[i].attr('href')!=null){
		list.push(lis[i].attr('href'))
		}
	}}
	list
</js>

{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleContent.content:
<js>
try{
form=java.getElement("#content label")
txt=java.getElement("#content [class=001] p")
while (form!=""){
	code=String(java.getString("strong@textNodes",form)).trim()
	java.log(code)
	result=java.ajax(`${baseUrl},{"body":"captcha=${code}","method":"POST"}`)
	java.setContent(result)
	form=java.getElement("#content form")
	}
b64=result.match(/atob\('([^']+)'\)/)[1]
if(result.match(/'aes'\s*===\s*'aes'/)){
	key=result.match(/CryptoJS\.enc\.Base64\.parse\('([^']+)'\)/)[1]
	
	txt+=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/ECB/Pkcs7Padding", java.base64DecodeToByteArray(key)).decryptStr(b64)
	}else{
		txt+=java.base64Decode(b64)
		
		}
result=txt}catch{result="\n这章正文不存在！！！\n换一章！！！\n或者\n换本书！！！\n或者\n换源！！！"}
</js>

<js>

if(cf){
	cookie.removeCookie(source.getKey());
	var x=java.get("url");
	b=java.startBrowserAwait(x,
		"验证");
	//b=java.webView(null,x,null)
	//b=java.ajax(x)
	result=b;
	}
		result;

</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
function d(a, b) {
            b = CryptoJS.MD5(b).toString();
            var d = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(0, 16));
            var e = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(16));
            return CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(a, e, { iv: d, padding: CryptoJS.pad.Pkcs7 }).toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8)
        }
match=src.match(/\.html\((d.*?"\))/);
//java.log(match[1])
if(match){
result=eval(match[1])}else result
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

\n?){2}/g,"

'; } } catch (err) { //java.log(baseUrl + "乱序恢复Aes解密no") } } //初始化图片链接 x(/[\r\n]?[\t ]*]+>[\t ]*[\r\n]?/g, "#$1#"); //初始化字体格式的文字,匹配 x(/(.*?)<\/i>/g, function(str, p1) { //java.log(p1.charCodeAt().toString(16)); //返回16进制，例：p1= 返回格式#e800# return '#' + p1.charCodeAt().toString(16) + '#' }) //转换空格 x(/ /g, ' '); //初始化分段准备 x(/[\t  ]{2,2}/g, "　"); //去掉标签里的属性 x(/(\<|<)([^\>]*?)(\s| )[^\>]*(\>|>)/g, "<$2>"); //段落换行 x(/\s*(\n|)+\s*(　{2,})?/gi, "\r\n"); //去掉不需要的标签 x(/([\r\n　]*\<\/?([A-Za-z]*)?\>[\r\n　]*)/gi, ""); //引号替换 x(/‘/g, "『"); x(/’/g, "』"); x(/“/g, "「"); x(/”/g, "」"); if (/(Undefined|(^\s*$))/.test(result)) { result = "

header:
<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
n=25               //设置25页，2500章
list=[baseUrl]; //创建第一个地址数组

for(var i=2;i<=n;i++){
list.push(baseUrl.replace(/page=\d+/,'page='+i));
}                     //循环添加至n个地址数组
list
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

}

				}

@js:
if(result.match(/replace/)){
s=result.match(/replace.*?\{(.*?)\}/)[1].replace(/\\/g,'\\\\')
num=s.split(',').length
for(var i=0;i<num;i++){
	m=s.match(/"(.*?)":"(.*?)"/)
	s=s.replace(/.*?,/,'')
	result=result.replace(new RegExp(m[2],'g'),m[1])
	}
	}else{
result

<js>
a="MjAyNTA0MjdieT0gPQ=="
r=java.getString(".word_read@p!-1:-2@html")
if(r==""){
a=src.match(/qsbs.bb\('([^']*)'\)/g)
for(i in a){	r+=java.base64Decode(String(a[i]).replace(/qsbs.bb\('([\s\S]*)'\)/g,"$1"))
	}
}
r
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
//获取目录列表
list=java.getElement(".section-list")
//若非详情页，正则匹配重复项
if(/\.html/.test(baseUrl)){
removelist=src.match(/\.section-list\.ycxsid\>li:nth(-last)?-child\(\d+\)/g)
//选择，去除
list.select(String(removelist)).remove()
}
//返回新列表
list
</js>li a

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{$.lastChapter.chapterName##正文卷.|正文.|VIP卷.|默认卷.|卷_|VIP章节.|免费章节.|章节目录.|最新章节.|[\(（【].*?[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字].*?[】）\)]}}•{{$..decTime}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleBookInfo.author: $.authorName

header:
<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

([\s\S]*?)<\/article>/); try { let cnt = JSON.parse( mat ? mat[1].replace(/\&/g, '"').replace(/\;/g, "").replace(/\#34/g, "") : result ); return (mat ? cnt.skeleton.data : cnt.picInfos) .map((i) => { let path = mat ? cnt.materials[i.element_name].data.web_uri : "novel-pic/" + i.md5; return ``; }) .join("

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function getBookIdFull(url) {
	const {java} = this
	$ = JSON.parse(url).data
	if ($.book_shelf_info != 0 && $.book_shelf_info != undefined) {
		arr = $.book_shelf_info.map($ => $.book_id)
	} else if (list = $.data_list != 0 && $.data_list != undefined)  {
		arr = $.data_list.map($ => $.book_id_str)
	} else {
		java.toast("获取 book_id 失败，你可能需要登录！")
	}
	return arr
}
let ck = "sessionid=" + (String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) ? String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) : (source.getLoginInfoMap() ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {})['手动登录Token'])

getShelf = () => {
let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'
let book_shelf_info = java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
  headers: {
    'Cookie': ck
  }
}))

bid = getBookIdFull(book_shelf_info)
let id_list = splitArray(bid, 100)
let urls = []
id_list.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(source.bookSourceUrl + "/multi-detail?book_id=" + i.join(","))
})

res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

let resp = {book_info: []}
res.forEach(r => {
  resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
})

return resp
}

function getByGroupName(name) {
  let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'

  let book_shelf_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'Cookie': ck,
    }
  })))
  let group_bookids = {
    "未分组": []
  }
  // java.log(
  book_shelf_info.data.book_shelf_info.forEach(i => {
    if (!group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "未分组"]) group_bookids[i.group_name] = []
    group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "未分组"].push(i.book_id)
  })
  // java.log(JSON.stringify(group_bookids["未分组"]))
  // java.log(decodeURIComponent(name))
  if (!group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)]) return {data: []}
  //java.log("awa")
  let book_ids = splitArray(group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)], 100)
  let urls = []

  book_ids.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(source.bookSourceUrl + "/multi-detail?book_id=" + i.join(","))
  })
  
  res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

  let resp = {book_info: []}
  res.forEach(r => {
    resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
  })

  return resp
}

function getByTabIndex(index) {
  let url = _mlsec.requestHeader(
	  "bookmall/tab",
    "version_name=5.8.9.32",
	  null,
	  ck
  )
  let all = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url))
  let tab = all.data.tab_item[0].cell_data[index].cell_data
  if (!tab) tab = []
  let bookList = []
  for (let i of tab) {
    bookList = bookList.concat(i.book_data)
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(i.book_data))
  }
  return { book_info: bookList }
}

if (baseUrl.endsWith("bookshelf")) result = getShelf("bookshelf/info")
else {
  let w = baseUrl.split("/")
  if (baseUrl.includes("groupName")) {
    result = getByGroupName(w[w.length - 1])
  } else if (baseUrl.includes("tab")) {
    result = getByTabIndex(parseInt(w[w.length - 1]))
  } else result = JSON.parse(result)
}
JSON.stringify({data: result.book_info || result.data.book_info || result.detail_list || result.data})
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    var txt = java.getString("#txt@html");
    java.longToast("正文解密失败，转为webView动态加载。");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    // 遍历数组，使用阅读内置Base64解码方法
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
//java.log(baseUrl)
result = java.getElements(".xs_info.-1@ul@li@a").toArray();
let start = 0;
let end = 0;
try {
 start = src.match(/li:nth-child\(\d+\){display:none}/gi).length;
 end = src.match(/li:nth-last-child\(\d+\){display:none}/gi).length;
} catch (err) { }

result = result.slice(start, result.length - end);

result
</js>
ruleToc.chapterName:
text@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    var txt = java.getString("#txt@html");
    java.longToast("正文解密失败，转为webView动态加载。");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    // 遍历数组，使用阅读内置Base64解码方法
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>##全本小说网.*最新章节！|uu看书.*com|请记住本书首发域名\：\。|手机版更新最快网址：|天才壹秒.*網.*

exploreUrl:
<js>
discover = [];
push = (title, url, style) => discover.push({ title: title, url: url, style: { layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: style } });
addSlots = (count, style) => {
    remainder = count % 3;
    slotsAdd = remainder === 0 ? 0 : 3 - remainder;
    for (i = 0; i < slotsAdd; i++) {
        push("", null, style);
    }
};
push("收藏夹", null, 1);
try {
    favored = java.ajax(`${baseUrl}/api/user/favored`);
    if (favored.includes("Token不合法或者过期")) {
        push("账号未登录", null, 0.25);
        addSlots(1, 0.25);
    } else {
        favoredData = JSON.parse(favored).favoredWeb;
        favoredData.forEach(item => {
            push(item.title, `/api/user/favored-web/${item.id}?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=30&sort=update`, 0.25);
        });
        addSlots(favoredData.length, 0.25);
    }
} catch (e) {
    push("未知错误", null, 0.25);
    addSlots(1, 0.25);
};
push("来源", null, 1);
providers = ["全部", "kakuyomu", "syosetu", "novelup", "hameln", "pixiv", "alphapolis"];
providers.forEach(provider => {
    url = provider === "全部" ? 
        `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=${providers.slice(1).join('%2C')}&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=0` : 
        `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=${provider}&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=0`;
    push(provider, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(providers.length, 0.25);
push("类型", null, 1);
types = ["全部", "连载中", "已完结", "短篇"];
types.forEach((type, index) => {
    url = `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=kakuyomu%2Csyosetu%2Cnovelup%2Chameln%2Cpixiv%2Calphapolis&type=${index}&level=0&translate=0&sort=0`;
    push(type, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(types.length, 0.25);
push("排序", null, 1);
sorts = ["更新", "点击"];
sorts.forEach((sort, index) => {
    url = `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=kakuyomu%2Csyosetu%2Cnovelup%2Chameln%2Cpixiv%2Calphapolis&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=${index}`;
    push(sort, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(sorts.length, 0.25);
JSON.stringify(discover);
</js>
loginUrl:
<js>
function login() {
    username = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("账号");
    password = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("密码");
    url = `${baseUrl}/api/auth/sign-in`;
    body = JSON.stringify({
        emailOrUsername: username,
        password: password
    });
    headers = {
        "Content-Type": "application/json"
    };
    response = java.post(url, body, headers);
    responseBody = response.body();
    authorizationObject = {
        Authorization: `Bearer ${responseBody}`
    };
    header = JSON.stringify(authorizationObject);
    source.putLoginHeader(header);
}
login();
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: authors..name
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
initUrl = book.bookUrl;
url = initUrl.includes('api/novel') ? initUrl : initUrl.replace('novel', 'api/novel');
body = initUrl.includes('api/novel') ? result : java.ajax(url);
if (body.includes('ID不合适，应当使用')) {
    match = body.match(/\/\w+\/[\w-]+/);
    url = `${book.origin}/api/novel${match}`;
    body = java.ajax(url);
}
if (body.includes("Token不合法或者过期")) {
    java.toast("当前会话已失效，请重新登录");
}
java.put('url', url);
body
</js>

ruleContent.content: value = String(book.getVariable("custom")) || String(source.getVariable()); get = (value >= '1' && value <= '9') ? value : '1'; config = { 1: 'sakuraParagraphs', 2: 'gptParagraphs', 3: 'youdaoParagraphs', 4: 'baiduParagraphs', 5: 'paragraphs' }; result = JSON.parse(result); content = result[config[get]] || result[config[2]] || result[config[3]] || result[config[4]] || result[config[5]]; if (['6', '7', '8', '9'].includes(get)) { type = ['6', '8'].includes(get); jpContent = result[config[5]]; cnContent = result[config[1]] || result[config[2]] || result[config[3]] || result[config[4]]; if (cnContent) { content = jpContent.flatMap((jp, i) => (type ? [cnContent[i], jp] : [jp, cnContent[i]])).filter(Boolean); } else { content = jpContent; } }; regex = content => { displayedImages = new Set(); return JSON.stringify(content).replace(/<图片>(https?:\/\/[^"\s]+)/g, (_, p1) => { if (displayedImages.has(p1)) return ''; displayedImages.add(p1); return ''; }); }; format = content => content.replace(/^\[|\]$/g, '').split(',').map(item => item.trim().replace(/^"|"$/g, '')).filter(Boolean).map((item, i) => item.startsWith('{"headers"') && i > 0 ? ',' + item : ' ' + item).join("\n"); format(regex(content));

searchUrl:
<js>
providers = {
    kakuyomu: /(?:https?:\/\/)?kakuyomu\.jp\/works\/(\d+)/,
    syosetu: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(ncode|novel18)\.syosetu\.com\/(\w+)/,
    novelup: /(?:https?:\/\/)?novelup\.plus\/story\/(\d+)/,
    hameln: /(?:https?:\/\/)?syosetu\.org\/novel\/(\d+)/,
    pixiv: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(www\.pixiv\.net\/novel\/series\/(\d+)|www\.pixiv\.net\/novel\/show\.php\?id=(\d+))/,
    alphapolis: /(?:https?:\/\/)?www\.alphapolis\.co\.jp\/novel\/(\d+)\/(\d+)/,
    sakura: /(?:https?:\/\/)?books\d?\.fishhawk\.top\/(?:api\/)?novel\/(\w+)\/([\w-]+)/
};
for (provider in providers) {
    match = key.match(providers[provider]);
    if (match) {
        providerId = provider === 'sakura' ? match[1] : provider;
        novelId = provider === 'alphapolis' ? `${match[1]}-${match[2]}` : provider === 'pixiv' ? (match[3] ? `s${match[3]}` : match[2]) : (match[2] || match[1]);
        url = `${baseUrl}/api/novel/${providerId}/${novelId}`;
        break;
    } else {
        url = `${baseUrl}/api/novel?page=${page-1}&pageSize=20&query=${key}&provider=kakuyomu,syosetu,novelup,hameln,pixiv,alphapolis&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=1`;
    }
    url
}
</js>

variableComment: 输入对应数字刷新即可获取对应文本，{1: "sakura译文", 2: "gpt译文", 3: "有道译文", 4: "百度译文", 5: "原文", 6: "中日", 7: "日中", 8: "5+6", 9: "5+7"}，默认sakura译文。书籍变量作用于一本书，源变量作用于整个书源，书籍变量优先级高于源变量。
